@Vanessa Lescano  hey Vanessa! Sure you can. Select the image you want to copy, right click and click Copy, head to another Page in Figma and Paste. ð

you kinda look like seth rolling

Shortcuts:
Find out how far away elements are from each other: double click until you select the element you want then hold Option/Alt
Create text: "t"
Create rectangle: "r"
Copy elements: hold Option/Alt and drag
